text: The Yukon Party is a conservative political party in Yukon, Canada. It was organized in 1978 as the Yukon Progressive Conservative Party. In 1991, it was renamed the "Yukon Party". In the 2002 elections, the Yukon Party won enough seats to form a government. The party also won the 2006 elections and the 2011 elections. They lost the 2016 elections and are the current Official Opposition. ==References== Category:Yukon Category:Political parties in Canada Category:Conservative parties Category:1978 establishments in Canada
title: Yukon Party
